title: China Wuxi Lakeside Hotel with Indoor Pool, Spa & Two Restaurants
description:
Set within Wuxi's vibrant Xinwu District, this contemporary retreat places you moments from the tranquil Taihu Lake and the lush greenery of Liyuan gardens. Explore the architectural marvels of Nanchan Temple or stroll the picturesque Grand Canal, both just a short drive away from your elegant urban retreat.

Return to refined interiors where you can savour Jiangnan cuisine at the sophisticated La Cuisine or sample Cantonese delicacies at Le Chinois Chinese Restaurant. When it's time to relax, the hotel features a shimmering heated indoor pool and a state-of-the-art spa offering indulgent treatments.
offer_address: No 30 Hefeng Road Xinwu District, Wuxi, Jiangsu 214135, China

title: Luxurious Lakeside China Stay with Indoor Pool & Fitness Centre
description: Find restoration and inspiration overlooking the immaculate natural surroundings at Crowne Plaza Wuxi Lake View, an IHG Hotel. This impeccably designed haven offers guests flexibility and comfort, along with stunning views of the beautiful Taihu Lake. When you can tear yourself away from your plush room, you'll be within easy reach of some of the areaâ€™s most-loved attractions including Changguangxi National Wetland Park, Xuelang Park and Wuxi Taihu International Expo Centre.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Wuxi Lake View, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.5 Wanda Cultural Tourism City, Wuxi 214100, China

title: Sophisticated Wuxi Escape Overlooking Taihu Square
description: Sitting on the banks of one of China's largest freshwater lakes is Wuxi, home to ancient pedestrianised streets and an abundance of green parks and canals - all of which can be accessed from InterContinental Wuxi, an IHG Hotel. Between exploring the city, allow yourself to wine and dine at any of the five onsite eateries: fill up your plate at I Cafe buffet restaurant, dine on the freshest seafoot at Aoi or treat yourself to prime imported steak at Senses Steak House.
offer_address: No.6 Yonghe Road, Liangxi District, Wuxi, 214000, Mainland China

title: Wuxi City Centre Stay Minutes from Nanchan Temple
description: In the heart of the Liangxi District, Crowne Plaza Wuxi City Center, an IHG Hotel, is the perfect launchpad for an expedition to discover Wuxi's gleaming treasures. Seek moments of tranquillity at Nanchan Temple before devouring xiao long bao at the markets just outside. Plunge into the hotel's crystal-clear indoor pool, be pampered with a spa treatment and indulge in steins of beer and German cuisine at Bavarian Brauhaus or unwind with a cool cocktail at Feng Huang Lobby Lounge.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Wuxi City Center, an IHG Hotel

title: China Wuxi Elegant City Break with Fine Dining Sichuan Restaurant
description: Discover the enchanting cityscape of Wuxi at Crowne Plaza Wuxi Taihu, an IHG Hotel. Take a dip in the indoor swimming pool, or sweat it out at the fitness centre. After working up an appetite, pop into any of the four onsite dining venues for a bite. Feast buffet-style at Le Cafe All Day Dining Restaurant, enjoy Sichuan fine dining at Le Taste Chinese Restaurant, indulge with handmade pasta at Paolo Italian Restaurant, and satisfy your sweet tooth with dessert and cocktails at the Lobby Lounge.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Wuxi Taihu, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 1888 Taihu Avenue, Binhu District, Wuxi 214072, China
